name: AssignLicense
description: Invoke action assignLicense. Add or remove licenses for the user to enable or disable their use of Microsoft cloud offerings that the company has licenses to. For example, an organization can have a Microsoft 365 Enterprise E3 subscription with 100 licenses, and this request assigns one of those licenses to a specific user. You can also enable and disable specific plans associated with a subscription. To get the subscriptions available in the directory, perform a GET subscribedSkus request.
